Package index

Description

paleta-package paleta
Collection of Palette, Theme, and Theme Components

Base Palettes, Themes, and Fonts

paleta_fonts
Base package fonts
set_paleta_font()
Set paleta font based on what is available in the system
theme_paleta()
A generic/base ggplot2 theme for the paleta package

Africa CDC

acdc_palettes
Africa CDC palettes
acdc_fonts set_acdc_font()
Africa CDC fonts
acdc_green acdc_red acdc_gold acdc_white acdc_grey acdc_corporate_green acdc_text acdc_blue acdc_plum acdc_blue_grey acdc_amber acdc_cyan acdc_deep_orange acdc_purple acdc_lime acdc_mauve acdc_pink acdc_teal
Africa CDC colours
theme_acdc_light() theme_acdc_dark()
A ggplot2 theme using Africa CDC fonts, colours, and palettes

World Bank colours
theme_wb()
A ggplot2 theme using World Bank fonts, colours, and palettes

Utilities

get_colour() get_colours()
Get named colours vector
print(<palette>)
Print function for palettes
tint_colour() tint_colours_() tint_colours()
Get tint of colours
shade_colour() shade_colours_() shade_colours()
Get shade of colours

Datasets

paleta_colours
Colours based on visual identity guidelines of various organisations
